item.title: (Linux) Extract Public Key & Fingerprint from Private
item.description: Extract Public Key and Fingerprint from Private Key When managing SSH keys, you may need to extract the public key or obtain the fingerprint of a private key. Below are the commands to accomplish these tasks. Get the Public Key To extract the public key from a private key file, use the following command: ssh-keygen -f keyname -y Replace keyname with the path to your private key file.
